name: Game-Debate - Fix notifications center
description:
Does the notification popups look very poor to you too?
This style will bring cool effects when hovered or clicked on the main icons, a more readable color, and some more.
additional_info: v1 - unreleased - buggy - This one had problems when clicking the "clear" button and the popup list closes, the main button was still lit-up. - Also the hovered (brighter) icons were hardly any brighter. v2 - 90% re-written. - Fixed the previous version problems. v3 - fixed the new shouts icon ** NOTE ** If your browser doesn't support pseudo elements, I strongly recommend you upgrade to any newer browser. .
